works.title: Adequacy of care management of patients with polyhandicap: The features of the French healthcare system
works.abstract:
Introduction/Background
The aims of this study were:
–to describe the health profiles and care management of polyhandicapped patients according to 3 modalities specialized rehabilitation centers (SRC), residential facilities (RF), and home care (HC);
–to estimate the adequacy of care management of these patients.

Material and method
This was an 18...
